content: Add missing imports to modules/uiModule.js (storage, date, form modules)
Implement the copyWeekToTargetWeek function in modules/uiModule.js
Implement other placeholder functions in modules/uiModule.js (updateLastWeekButtonDisplay, createLastWeekTimesheet, hideWeekSelectionModal)
Ensure closeCopyModal is globally accessible for HTML onclick handlers
Test the copy functionality end-to-end to ensure it works properly
